div.p: Creatures in a 15-foot cone from you are blinded. If a creature is already blind or unconscious, they are not affected. Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, roll 6d10 to see how many creatures you can affect. If the creature with the lowest hit points is less than the total rolled, subtract the hit points from the number, then move onto the next. When you reach a creature whose hit points would go above the number, subtractions applied, they are unaffected and this casting can't blind anything else.
At Higher Levels: Roll an additional 2d10 for each slot level above 1st.
